name: Focus on Homework
description:
Focus on Homework is a game about the experience of trying to complete normal, everyday tasks with ADHD, made by three college students with ADHD.

Of course, there is no way to capture the wide variety of ADHD symptoms and presentations in a single game, but our goal is to at least convey the frustration of keeping up with tasks when they always seem to overwhelm you before you know it. Every little thing demands your attention, and trying too hard to ignore it all only makes you more stressed.

This game is intended for non-ADHD audiences, with the goal of fostering empathy for those of us who do struggle.

David Eisenberg -- Programming, music

Casey Elise Taylor (VampPhoenix99) -- Writing, puzzle design

Matthew Carey -- Sound design, artwork
